sub_topic: Probability of winning a game of chance
message_1: If a fair six-sided die is rolled, what is the probability of winning if the game is to roll a certain number (let's say 3) and the player wins if that number appears on the die?
message_2: If a fair six-sided die is rolled, there is an equal probability of each number (1 through 6) appearing on the die. Since there is only one desired outcome (rolling a 3) out of the six possible outcomes, the probability of winning is 1/6 or approximately 16.67%.
